decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (LP/01, A/427/01, A/427/03, received 3rd February, A/A27/02 A 17/6/14, received 17/6/2014 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension and outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in both structures without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The detached outbuilding shall continue to be ancillary to the enjoyment of the single family dwelling known as 150 Guildford Avenue, Feltham and shall be used for no other purpose (i.e. it shall not be used as a bedroom, living room, office or other business use or as a seperate dwelling).
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and a single storey outbuilding in rear garden for use as a Gym
